message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. This is a competitive price considering its value to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go.  Given the value to me, I'm prepared to pay $9,500.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $9,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $13,500, which is a good compromise considering the value of the product to you. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $13,500 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to go to $10,500. Let's see if we can find common ground.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $13,000. I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product to you. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you at $13,000.
